Blackjack is a card game where the objec: Blackjack is a card game where the objective is to sum 21 points to your hand, or closer than that, without busting. It's you against the dealer!
Each player receives two cards, while th: Each player receives two cards, while the Dealer's second card is always flipped. If one of the players has a Blackjack, it's endgame!
The button HIT allows to add one card to: The button HIT allows to add one card to your hand, since you have 21 or less points in your hand.
The button STAND ends your turn, and sta: The button STAND ends your turn, and starts Dealer's turn.
When your turn is finished, Dealer's sec: When your turn is finished, Dealer's second card will be displayed to you.
If Dealer's two cards sum is greater tha: If Dealer's two cards sum is greater than 17, it's endgame, and the winner is the one with more points in hand!
If Dealer's two cards sum is lower than: If Dealer's two cards sum is lower than 17, the Dealer will hit cards until having 17 points in hand.
